rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现多焦点隐形眼镜对减缓近视有持久的好处休斯敦大学视光学院 Golden-Golden 验光学教授兼临床科学系主任 David Berntsen 为遏制近视浪潮十年来的努力画上句号，他报告称，他的团队开发的减缓近视的方法不仅有效，而且持久。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-finds- permanent-benefits-of-multifocal-contact-lenses-in-slowing-myopia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Study-finds- permanent-benefits-of-multifocal-contact-lenses-in-slowing-myopia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8eb889b0-c596-4e60-b046-33d213df8202 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 14:26:41 -0500 Study finds lasting benefits of multifocal contact lenses in slowing myopia
无毒细菌疗法有望靶向肿瘤马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特-欧内斯特制药公司的科学家团队在开发无毒细菌疗法 BacID 方面取得了“令人兴奋的”、对患者友好的进展，该疗法可将抗癌药物直接输送到肿瘤中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Non-known-bacterial-therapy-shows-promise-for-targeting-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Non-known-bacterial-therapy-shows-promise-for-targeting-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99b303aa-007b-4e15-8af0-1a65e2e28f69 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 14:22:00 -0500 Non-toxic bacterial therapy shows promise for targeting tumors
NIMH 为长期新冠神经学研究提供 150 万美元资助美国国家心理健康研究所向田纳西大学健康科学中心的杜建阳博士提供了 150 万美元的巨额资助，用于一项研究，旨在揭示导致长期新冠病毒引起的神经系统疾病的细胞和分子机制-19。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/NIMH-awards-2415-million-grant-for-long-COVID-neurological-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/NIMH-awards-2415-million-grant-for-long-COVID-neurological-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8fbe3f8-a166-4691-b780-de3739d41d2f Thu, 16 Jan 2025 14:17:56 -0500 NIMH awards $1.5 million grant for long COVID neurological research
弱势儿童营养不良会增加麻疹风险在全球麻疹病例激增的情况下，新的研究表明，营养不良可能会加剧粮食不安全地区的疫情爆发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Measles-risk-heightened-by-undernutrition-in-vulnerable-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Measles-risk-heightened-by-undernutrition-in-vulnerable-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f9c3c62-19d3-404d-9af2-3c5718978232 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 14:16:44 -0500 Measles risk heightened by undernutrition in vulnerable children
纽约市大多数纳洛酮接受者存在服药过量的高风险根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员和纽约市健康与心理卫生局的一项新研究，纽约市绝大多数获得纳洛酮试剂盒来对抗阿片类药物过量的人对该药物有很高的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Majority-of-naloxone-recipients-in-NYC-at-high-risk-of-overdose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Majority-of-naloxone-recipients-in-NYC-at-high-risk-of-overdose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51e987e1-44e7-4ea5-8e5f-f0b899edd857 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 14:08:52 -0500 Majority of naloxone recipients in NYC at high risk of overdose
宽带接入与减少 COVID-19 病例和死亡有关2020 年夏季和初秋，美国互联网接入水平较高的县的 COVID-19 死亡率降低了约 50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Broadband-access-linked-with-fewer-COVID-19-cases-and-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Broadband-access-linked-with-fewer-COVID-19-cases-and-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71af9ff6-03f3-4477-891b-57c11e5c72a5 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 14:05:07 -0500 Broadband access associated with fewer COVID-19 cases and deaths
科学家发现亨廷顿病脑细胞死亡背后的新机制麻省理工学院和哈佛大学布罗德研究所、哈佛医学院和麦克莱恩医院的科学家们发现了一种令人惊讶的机制，通过这种机制，已知导致亨廷顿病的遗传性基因突变会导致脑细胞死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Scientists-discover-new-mechanism-behind-Huntingtone28099s-disease-brain-cell-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Scientists-discover-new-mechanism-behind-Huntingtone28099s-disease-brain-cell-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a08d4f4-4e23-4ae7-b5aa-8de1dbf3d040 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:58:59 -0500 Scientists discover new mechanism behind Huntington’s disease brain cell death
CD74蛋白可以预测肠癌的免疫治疗反应伦敦玛丽女王大学弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和巴茨癌症研究所的研究人员表明，一种名为 CD74 的蛋白质的含量可以表明哪些肠癌患者对免疫疗法的反应最好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Protein-CD74-could-predict-immunotherapy-response-in-bowel-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Protein-CD74-could-predict-immunotherapy-response-in-bowel-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2423cbc-ccbe-4a98-8b52-7dd1e831fbc8 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:49:10 -0500 Protein CD74 could predict immunotherapy response in bowel cancer
极端降雨增加了德克萨斯州少数族裔社区的大肠杆菌暴露量没有人愿意在水中与大肠杆菌共度一天。这种细菌是粪便污染的明确标志，粪便被雨水从农田或污水系统冲入水道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Extreme-rainfall-increases-E-coli-exposure-for-minority-communities-in-Texas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Extreme-rainfall-increases-E-coli-exposure-for-minority-communities-in-Texas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3940861c-5e90-4c3f-b877-fbe71808206d Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:31:18 -0500 Extreme rainfall increases E. coli exposure for minority communities in Texas
饮酒会增加乙型肝炎病毒感染者患肝硬化和肝癌的风险饮酒对乙型肝炎病毒 (HBV) 感染的肝硬化和肝细胞癌 (HCC) 的定量影响尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Alcohol-conspiration-increases-risks-of-cirrosis-and-HCC-in-病人-with-HBV-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Alcohol-conspiration-increases-risks-of-cirrosis-and-HCC-in-病人-with-HBV-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ceeec485-9b82-42ca-8bae-ccd244e3b3da Thu, 16 Jan 2025 13:17:19 -0500 Alcohol consumption increases risks of cirrhosis and HCC in patients with HBV infection
